1021201.name: Heishou Mutation [Mao] / Mao Branch Adept
1021201.desc:
If this unit's Speed is faster than the target's, deal +2% more damage for every 1 Speed difference (max 10%)

Gain 1 [EnhanceZilu] every time an ally triggers a Deathrite effect (5 times per turn)
- If this unit triggered a Deathrite effect, gain 1 additional [EnhanceZilu]
When activating the [SupportProtect] effect, gain 5 [EnhanceZilu]

1021203.name: Tianjiu Star
1021203.desc: When [BurstZilu] Stack drops to 0 and expires, gain [BurstVulnerableZilu]

1021221.name: Blinkblade
1021221.desc: When 1 ally with the fastest Speed inflicts [Burst] damage, gain 1 [AttackUp] next turn (3 times per turn)

notes.short: Standard Heishou (S3 or defense gives a 3 turn buff, works with {identity:10613} mechanics) + Adept (builds a resource that's consumed to use a stronger S3) mechanics. Use S3 at 10+ {status:EnhanceZilu}. Use defense to trigger {status:SupportProtect} to redirect unopposed attacks against allies and generate {status:EnhanceZilu} if her passive is active. At 10+ {status:EnhanceZilu}, {status:SupportProtect} will trigger her S3-2 instead.
notes.full:
Use S3 or defense to gain {status:LegStrength} for 3 turns, giving {status:Agility}. All her skills are stronger based on speed, especially at 10+ speed where her S1, S3, and S3-2 all gain a coin reuse, and S3-2 gains guaranteed crits on all coins, so always keep it up.

Inflicts {status:BurstAgility}with S3 and inflicts that and {status:BurstZilu} with S3-2. Deathrites trigger additional effects on the target whenever {status:Burst} is triggered, and deals additional {keyword:Gluttony} damage based on {status:Burst} when fully consumed. When {status:BurstZilu} is consumed, she inflicts {status:BurstVulnerableZilu} on that enemy, increasing damage taken from {keyword:Gluttony} or Deathrite effects.

Her passive must be active for her to start gaining {status:EnhanceZilu}. She'll gain 1 whenever a Deathrite effect is triggered (2 if she triggers it) up to 5 times per turn and 5 whenever her {status:SupportProtect} is triggered. Having 10+ {status:EnhanceZilu} will cause both her S3 and {status:SupportProtect} to consume 10 stacks and trigger S3-2 instead. Using her defense to trigger {status:SupportProtect} every turn is self-sufficient to trigger S3-2 every turn if she is always at 10+ speed. At 9- speed, she may need someone else to trigger 1 Deathrite for the last {status:EnhanceZilu} if she had exactly 10 at the start. Note that {status:SupportProtect} needs to actually trigger (an enemy should have an unopposed attack to an ally that is NOT Faust) for this to work.

Her buff for {identity:10613} is a 5% damage reduction, making her a low priority for triggering the combo if that's your goal.
